TextView.android:text: PLAYER_LEVEL is your character level. The higher level you are, the better stats you'll have. You may level up by gaining exp through running, completing tasks or collecting chests. PLAYER_EXP is your experience. Once your experience reaches the value to level up, you'll level up and your experience will be reset. PLAYER_EXP is your health point. To defeat a monster, you need to keep your HP above 0 and get the monster's HP to 0. PLAYER_MP is your magic point. It's used to cast spells. PLAYER_MILES is the total number of miles you have run.
